resources:
Buddha Quotes
Just as the great oceans have but one taste, the taste of salt, so too there is but one taste fundamental to all true teachings of the way, and this is the taste of freedom.
Time and tide wait for no man
Believe there is good in the word
If anything is worth doing,do it with all your heart
Those who are free of resentful thoughts csurely find peace
The wise have mastered body,word,mind.They are the true masters
Resolutely train yoursself to attain peace
Most problems, if you give them enough time and space,will eventually wear themself out
Aim for success, not perfection. Never give up because you will lose the ability to learn new things
three things cannot be long hidden;the sun,the moon and the truth
Buddha
